metadata.title: Your Next Store - Demo
metadata.description: A Next.js boilerplate for building your online store instantly: simple, quick, powerful.

notFound.title: Not found
notFound.description: The page you were looking for does not exist.

newsletter.success: You have successfully subscribed to our newsletter.
newsletter.error: Failed to subscribe to our newsletter.

cartSummary.totalItems: {count, plural, =0 {No items} =1 {# item} other {# items}} in cart

deliveryEstimates.businessDay: {count, plural, =1 {# business day} other {# business days}}

allProducts.title: All products
allProducts.description: All products in our store are listed here.

bags.title: Bags
bags.description: All bag products in our store.

backpacks.title: Backpacks
backpacks.description: All backpack products in our store.

pouches.title: Pouches
pouches.description: All pouch products in our store.

features.title: Features
features.description: A list of all the features of Your Next Store.

whereToBuy.title: Where to buy
whereToBuy.description: Join our community and get the latest news about our products.

instagram.title: Instagram
instagram.description: Follow us on Instagram to get inspired by the latest trends and updates. Don't miss our daily posts!

facebook.title: Facebook
facebook.description: Like our Facebook page and stay updated with exclusive news. Join our community today!

whatsapp.title: Whatsapp
whatsapp.description: Contact us on WhatsApp for quick and personalized support. We're here to help!

hero.title: Crochet with style: unique bags for every moment
hero.description: Explore and choose the perfect model for any occasion, customizing it in the colors and details you want.

notFound.title: No Results Found for "{query}"
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find any results that match your search query. Please try refining your search.

modal.title: Shopping Cart
modal.shippingAndTaxesInfo: Shipping and taxes will be added at the next step

page.title: Your cart
page.checkoutDescription: Provide billing and shipping details below.

stripePayment.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in the required fields.

empty.title: Your cart is empty
empty.description: Looks like you haven't added anything to your cart yet.

page.title: Order Confirmation
page.description: Thank you! You'll find the details of your order below.
